description: Runs an SQL query on an Oracle Database and returns the results as a datatable.

input.name: hostname
input.description: The name of the database host. Defaults to "localhost".

input.name: port
input.description: The port on which the database server is running. Defaults to 1521.

input.name: service
input.description: The name of the service (e.g XEPDB1 for pluggable database).

input.name: username
input.description: The database server username. Defaults to "root".

output.name: data
output.description: An object containing columns and rows.
